DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance new dental adhesive system restoration Class I Class II cavity adult teeth .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation 3M™ ESPE™ Adper™ Scotchbond™ SE Self-Etch Adhesive Class I Class II Restorations Adults
DOC.criteria: Must least 18 year age Must 2 4 qualify Class I Class II cavity Must willing sign consent form Must willing return University dental clinic 4 study appointment Must good medical health able tolerate dental procedure Current participation restorative product study Known allergy dental product Unacceptable level oral hygiene Chronic periodontitis ( gum disease ) Rampant caries ( cavity ) Severe salivary gland problem Inability unwillingness attend study appointment
